title: LTT: T206 Sheckard & Hummel for other T206 cards
author: T2069bk

posts.post_title: LTT: T206 Sheckard & Hummel for other T206 cards
posts.post_content:
Greetings!  I have a pair of T206 that I would love to do an old fashioned one for one trade for other T206s I may need (I need a lot, but will try to list some ideas below).

What I have to offer:

Jimmy Sheckard (Glove Show)Piedmont 350-460 Factory 25 - Front: Crease across middle, white mark near left eye, touched corners and edges & general toning.  Back: o/c L/R

John Hummel Sweet Caporal 350-460 Factory 42 - Front: General corner/edge wear and toning.  Back: Few Stains, fading and some additional paper left on(have to assume someone removed from a scrapbook).

I need a lot of cards, but would prefer a Cub like:

Sheckard (No glove)
Kling
Moran
Needham
Pfeffer
Pfeister (throwing)
Reulbach (any)

Also would love these non-Cubs:
Chief Meyers
Barbeau
Armbruster
Bradley
Camnitz
Leach (bending)
Davy Jones
Fielder Jones
Frank Smith

Those are just a few that are on my want list- feel free to DM me or email me [url]t2069bk@yahoo.com[/url] if you have others that you have for trade- I might just need them anyway.

Thanks for looking
Tim
